title: Product Updates: The May 2024 Edition | Similarweb
description: Similarweb's exciting new features and product updates for May are wrapped up in this short blog post. Find out how the force (of fresh data) can be with you, year-round.
content: HomeBlogUpdatesProduct UpdatesSimilarweb Product Updates: The May 2024 Edition Updates Similarweb Product Updates: The May 2024 Edition Start your free trial by Adelle Kehoe , Director of Content Marketing 3 Min. Try it now Stock Intelligence: Richer and more granular data And we have two more exciting updates in Stock Intelligence.
